cleaned_text: Hi everyone, I have a number of Dr. Steiner's books. Amazing! He mentions the evolving nature of God, not using those words exactly, as the mineral/vegetable/animal/human kingdoms evolve. He also mentions something interesting about reincarnation which I found interesting: When one is a human being, one can't devolve to something else because the development already was done in the min./veg./animal kingdoms!
